Catalog.Name: VVV_DR1
Catalog.Description: VISTA Variables in the Via Lactea survey

Table.Name: vvvSource
Table.Description: Contains merged sources from detections in vvvDetection

Column.Name: sourceID
Column.Description: UID (unique over entire VSA via programme ID prefix) of this merged detection as assigned by merge algorithm

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: frameSetID
Column.Description: UID of the set of frames that this merged source comes from

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Celestial Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Celestial Declination

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2

Column.Name: priOrSec
Column.Description: Seam code for a unique (=0) or duplicated (!=0) source (eg. flags overlap duplicates).

Column.Name: zmyPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour Z-Y (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: zmyPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour Z-Y

Column.Name: ymjPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour Y-J (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: ymjPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour Y-J

Column.Name: jmhPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour J-H

Column.Name: hmksPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour H-Ks (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: hmksPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour H-Ks

Column.Name: mergedClassStat
Column.Description: Merged N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic

Column.Name: mergedClass
Column.Description: Class flag from available measurements (1|0|-1|-2|-3|-9=galaxy|noise|stellar|probableStar|probableGalaxy|saturated)

Column.Name: pStar
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a star

Column.Name: pGalaxy
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a galaxy

Column.Name: pNoise
Column.Description: Probability that the source is noise

Column.Name: pSaturated
Column.Description: Probability that the source is saturated

Table.Name: vvvDetection

Table.Name: ArchiveCurationHistory
Table.Description: Contains details of the matrix of the Archives' required curation tasks

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: cuID
Column.Description: the unique curation task ID

Column.Name: logFile
Column.Description: filename of verbose logged task output

Column.Name: resultsFile
Column.Description: filename of any results file

Column.Name: timeStamp
Column.Description: Time of the completion of the whole task

Column.Name: curator
Column.Description: The archive curation scientist responsible for this event

Column.Name: comment
Column.Description: Comment string supplied by the curator

Column.Name: rolledBack
Column.Description: Flag for roll-back of this event: 0=no, 1 = yes

Table.Name: AstrCalVers
Table.Description: Contains a record for every astrometric calibration version in the archive

Column.Name: versNum
Column.Description: Version number of current astrometric solution

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: startDate
Column.Description: MJD of the start time for this version of the calibration

Column.Name: endDate
Column.Description: MJD of the end time for this version of the calibration

Table.Name: CurationTask
Table.Description: Contains a list of all curation tasks that are used within the VSA

Column.Name: cuID
Column.Description: the unique curation task ID

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: description in words for this task

Table.Name: CurrentAstrometry
Table.Description: Contains the current astrometric calibration coefficients

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: extNum
Column.Description: the extension number of this frame

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: distortMap
Column.Description: filename of 2d non-linear distortion map

Column.Name: centralRa
Column.Description: RA (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: centralDec
Column.Description: Dec (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: posAngle
Column.Description: orientation of image x-axis to N-S

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude of device centre

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude of device centre

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1 of device centre

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2 of device centre

Column.Name: imageExtent
Column.Description: The maximum angular extent from the central position

Column.Name: minRa
Column.Description: The minimum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: minDec
Column.Description: The minimum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxRa
Column.Description: The maximum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxDec
Column.Description: The maximum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: yPixSize
Column.Description: Angular size of pixels in Y

Table.Name: ExternalSurvey
Table.Description: A list of all externally produced survey products held in the archive

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: surveyName
Column.Description: The short name of the survey, eg. 2MASS, GLIMPSE etc.

Column.Name: databaseName
Column.Description: The name of the database within the VSA

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: A brief description of the survey

Column.Name: imagesLocation
Column.Description: Pathname to the pixels (eg. for list-driven remeasurement)

Table.Name: ExternalSurveyTable
Table.Description: Contains information about the external surveys tables

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: extTableID
Column.Description: the unique table ID

Column.Name: extTableName
Column.Description: the name of the table

Column.Name: sourceIDName
Column.Description: The source unique identifier in the table

Column.Name: coord1
Column.Description: The attribute name of the first (longitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial RA

Column.Name: coord2
Column.Description: The attribute name of the second (latitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial Dec

Table.Name: Filter
Table.Description: Contains details of the VISTA infrared camera filters

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in VSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=Ks)

Column.Name: shortName
Column.Description: Short identification name for the filter

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: The name of the filter, eg. "MKO J", "K short" etc.

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a concise description of the filter

Column.Name: cutOn
Column.Description: The 50% cut-on wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: cutOff
Column.Description: The 50% cut-off wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: aebv
Column.Description: The constant to multiply the Schlegel map E(B-V) by to get the total galactic extinction.

Column.Name: vegaToAB
Column.Description: The constant to convert Vega magnitudes to AB magnitudes.

Column.Name: oneSecMLVg
Column.Description: The Vega magnitude limit of a 1s exposure in this filter

Table.Name: Multiframe
Table.Description: Contains details of all multiframes stored in the archive

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: UID of the multiframe (assigned sequentially by the archive ingest process)

Column.Name: vistaRunNo
Column.Description: Original VISTA run number (from filename)

Column.Name: frameType
Column.Description: The type of multiframe (e.g. stack|tile|mosaic etc.)

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: julianDayNum
Column.Description: The Julian Day number of the VISTA night

Column.Name: fileTimeStamp
Column.Description: Time stamp digits (from the original CASU directory name and file time stamp) for enforcing uniqueness

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in VSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=Ks)

Column.Name: project
Column.Description: Time-allocation code

Column.Name: utDate
Column.Description: Observation date (MM-DD-YYYY)

Column.Name: numDetectors
Column.Description: The number of "detectors" (=image extensions in FITS file)

Column.Name: raMoon
Column.Description: Geocentric J2000 FK5 Mean Right ascension of the Moon

Column.Name: decMoon
Column.Description: Geocentric J2000 FK5 Mean Declination of the Moon

Column.Name: illumMoon
Column.Description: Illumination of the Moon

Column.Name: raMoonTopo
Column.Description: Apparent topocentric Right ascension of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

Column.Name: decMoonTopo
Column.Description: Apparent topocentric Declination of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

Column.Name: fileName
Column.Description: the filename for the multiframe, eg. server:/path/filename.fit

Column.Name: catName
Column.Description: the filename of the associated catalogue MEF, eg. server:/path/filename.fits

Column.Name: versionNum
Column.Description: a version number for this frame (if available)

Column.Name: frinID
Column.Description: UID of library calibration fringe frame

Column.Name: deprecated
Column.Description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) multiframe

Column.Name: newlyIngested
Column.Description: Curation flag for internal use only (0=no, 1=yes)

Column.Name: illumFile
Column.Description: File name of CASU created photometric illumination correction used on catalogue data from this file

Column.Name: unfilteredID
Column.Description: UID of original unfiltered frame corresponding to this filtered frame

Column.Name: totalExpTimeSum
Column.Description: Total integration time of all exposures (s) --K TEXPSUM
